resources.string: Enter child\'s date of birth below (e.g Jan 26, 2014):
WELCOME TO THE MLI FAMILY. WE WILL PROVIDE YOU WITH UPDATES ABOUT YOUR CHILD\'S VACCINATION AND HEALTH UP TO THE AGE OF 1. THANKS FOR BEING A PART OF THIS FAMILY
CONGRATS on your delivery! We hope baby received its 1st vaccines (OPV, BCG). BREASTFEED EXCLUSIVELY for 6 months, DO NOT give water and DO NOT mix feed.
Report to the nearest health facility if you have any of the following WARNING SIGNS: fever, abdominal pain, blurred vision, excessive bleeding or breast pain.
Ensure proper hygiene for yourself and your baby to prevent disease. Wash your breast with soap and water before breastfeeding. FAMILY PLANNING is advised.
HELLO! Your baby is about 6 weeks old. Remember taking baby for its 6 weeks vaccines (OPV1, DPT-1-HEP B1-Hib1, PNEUMO 13.1 and ROTA 1).
HELLO! Your baby is about 10 weeks old. Remember taking baby for its 10 weeks vaccines (OPV2, DPT-2-HEP B2-Hib2, PNEUMO 13.2 and ROTA 2).
HELLO! Your baby is about 14 weeks old. Remember taking baby for its 14 weeks vaccines (OPV3, DPT-3-HEP B3-Hib3, PNEUMO 13.3).
HELLO! Your baby is now 6 months old. Remember taking baby for its 6 months vaccine (VITAMIN A). Ensure baby drinks CLEAN water to prevent diarrhoea.
HELLO! Your baby is now 9 months old. Remember taking him/her for vaccination (MEASLES, YELLOW FEVER). Your baby will then be fully immunised according to EPI.
